abstracts.cdata!:
The project would enable rationalization
            of the existing secondary and vocational eduational systems
            and would place greater emphasis on practical training. It
            would consist of: (i) six science workshops for communal use
            by private schools; (ii) sixnew public lower secondary
            schools; (iii) an Industrial Trade Training Center (ITTC);
            and (iv) five Rural Education Centers. It would also provide
            specialist services and fellowships for the ITTC and the
            Program Implementation Unit.
